item.title: Suse SLES for the first time
item.description: SLES (Suse Linux Enterprise registration, repository Prequisites: registration at myaccount.suse.com login go to download go to https://scc.suse.com/organizations/712401/subscriptions?family=sles and subscribe SUSEConnect -r 57D5AC4E2693FAC6 sleep 30 SUSEConnect -p PackageHub/12.5/x86_64 test install suatu package zypper -y install sudo
